tool.name: PDAUG Add Class Label
tool.description: Add class label to training data set
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool adds class labels to a dataframe.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** Takes input as Tabular data file. * **--ClassLabel** Class label. * **--ClassLLabelTitle** Column name of class label.
-----
**Outputs** * **--OutFile** Returns a tabular file with the class labels.
